name: Notebook request template
about: Issue for requesting a notebook
title: Add new notebook [NOTEBOOK_REQUEST]
labels: Code request, Notebook request

---

### Description:

Provide a description of the notebook request wanted.

---
### Location:

Specify if the notebook should be within a specific package, grouping etc. or if a new folder should be started in the repo root. Please also state if it should be linked to other code in the repository.

---

### Prior example:

Provide a code block, link or attach an example if available/appropriate. If not leave blank or NA.
